languages.text: {n}Идира тяжело дышит, глядя на вас со смесью отчаяния и недоверия. А потом, неожиданно, опускается на колени и устало всхлипывает.{/n} "Все было так хорошо, пока Леди Теодора была жива... она ценила меня, она дала мне новую жизнь! И голоса почти не мучили. А потом... потом... после... она стала приходить ко мне во снах, голоса стали звать днем и ночью..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира тяжело дышит, глядя на вас со смесью отчаяние и недоверия. А потом, неожиданно, опускается на колени и устало всхлипывает.{/n} "Все было так хорошо, пока леди Теодора была жива... она ценила меня, она дала мне новую жизнь! И голоса почти не мучили. А потом... потом... после... она стала приходить ко мне во снах, голоса стали звать днем и ночью..."

languages.text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира тяжело дышит, глядя на вас со смесью отчаяния и недоверия. А потом... потом... после... она стала приходить ко мне во снах, голоса стали звать днем и ночью..."

And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices were now calling to me day and night..."

languages.text: {n}イディラは荒い息をつきながら、絶望と不信が入り混じった表情で見ている。そして突然、膝をつき嗚咽を漏らした。{/n}「レディ・シオドーラが生きていたときは、すべてがうまくいっていた…彼女は私に感謝し、新しい人生を与えてくれたわ！声もほとんど気にならなかった。でも…その後.…彼女の夢を見るようになった。今では昼も夜もその声が私に呼びかける…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは荒い息をつきながら、絶望と不信が入り混じった表情で見ている。そして突然、膝をつき嗚咽を漏らした。{/n}「レディ・シオドーラが生きていたときは、すべてがうまくいっていた…彼女は私に感謝し、新しい人生を与えてくれたわ！声もほとんど気にならなかった。でも…その後.…彼女の夢を見るようになった。今では昼も夜もその声が私に呼びかける…」

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉气喘吁吁，带着绝望与怀疑的神色看着你。随后，她突然跪倒在地，发出了疲惫的呜咽。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人活着的时候，一切都很顺利……她认可了我，给了我新的生活！那些声音几乎也没有给我带来过任何麻烦。可……可在……在那之后……我开始在梦里见到她，那些声音也开始没日没夜地呼唤我……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉气喘吁吁，带着绝望与怀疑的神色看着你。随后，她突然跪倒在地，发出了疲惫的呜咽。{/n}“西奥多拉夫人活着的时候，一切都很顺利……她认可了我，给了我新的生活！那些声音几乎也没有给我带来过任何麻烦。可……可在……在那之后……我开始在梦里见到她，那些声音也开始没日没夜地呼唤我……”

languages.text: {n}Idira respira con dificultad mientras te mira con una mezcla de desesperación y desconfianza. De repente, cae de rodillas y suelta un sollozo de cansancio.{/n} «Todo iba tan bien cuando lady Theodora seguía viva... Me apreciaba, ¡me dio una nueva vida! Y las voces apenas me daban problemas. Pero entonces... entonces... después de que... empezó a aparecer en mis sueños y las voces empezaron a llamarme día y noche...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira respira con dificultad mientras te mira con una mezcla de desesperación y desconfianza. De repente, cae de rodillas y suelta un sollozo de cansancio.{/n} «Todo iba tan bien cuando lady Theodora seguía viva... Me apreciaba, ¡me dio una nueva vida! Y las voces apenas me daban problemas. Pero entonces... entonces... más tarde... empezó a aparecer en mis sueños y las voces ahora me llaman día y noche...».

languages.text: {n}Idira atmet schwer und blickt dich mit einer Mischung aus Verzweiflung und Misstrauen an. Dann fällt sie plötzlich auf die Knie und schluchzt erschöpft auf.{/n} "Alles lief so gut, als Lady Theodora noch am Leben war ... Sie hat mich geschätzt, sie hat mir ein neues Leben geschenkt! Und die Stimmen haben mir kaum Probleme bereitet. Aber dann ... dann ... nachdem sie ... Ich fing an, sie in meinen Träumen zu sehen, und jetzt rufen die Stimmen Tag und Nacht nach mir ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira atmet schwer und blickt dich mit einer Mischung aus Verzweiflung und Misstrauen an. Dann fällt sie plötzlich auf die Knie und schluchzt erschöpft auf.{/n} "Alles lief so gut, als Lady Theodora noch am Leben war ... Sie hat mich geschätzt, sie hat mir ein neues Leben geschenkt! Und die Stimmen haben mir kaum Probleme bereitet. Aber dann ... dann ... später ... Da habe ich angefangen, sie in meinen Träumen zu sehen, und jetzt rufen die Stimmen Tag und Nacht nach mir ..."

languages.text: {n}Le souffle court, Idira vous jette un coup d'œil dans lequel vous lisez autant de désespoir que de méfiance. Après un court instant d'hésitation, elle finit par tomber à genoux en sanglotant.{/n} « Tout allait si bien quand dame Théodora était en vie... Elle m'appréciait à ma juste valeur, elle m'avait offert une nouvelle vie ! Et les voix se tenaient tranquilles. Mais... mais... après... j'ai commencé à la voir dans mes rêves, et les voix se sont mises à me harceler jour et nuit... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le souffle court, Idira vous jette un coup d'œil dans lequel vous lisez autant de désespoir que de méfiance. Après un court instant d'hésitation, elle finit par tomber à genoux en sanglotant.{/n} « Tout allait si bien quand dame Théodora était en vie... Elle m'appréciait à ma juste valeur, elle m'a offert une nouvelle vie ! Et les voix se tenaient tranquilles. Mais... mais... après... j'ai commencé à la voir dans mes rêves, et les voix me harcelaient jour et nuit... »

languages.text: {n}İdira, çaresizlik ve kuşku akan gözlerle sana bakarken zorlukla nefes alıyor. Sonra aniden diz çöküp yorgunca ağlamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora hayattayken her şey yolunda gidiyordu... Benim değerimi bilirdi, hayatımı değiştirmişti! Neredeyse hiç ses duymaz olmuştum. Fakat sonra... Sonra... O... Onu rüyalarımda görmeye başladım. Sesler de gece gündüz kafamdan çıkmaz oldu..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira is breathing heavily as she looks at you with a mixture of despair and distrust. Then she suddenly slumps to her knees and lets out a tired sob.{/n} "Everything was going so well when Lady Theodora was alive... She appreciated me, she gave me a new life! And the voices were barely giving me any trouble. But then... then... after she... I started seeing her in my dreams, and the voices started calling to me day and night..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, çaresizlik ve kuşkuyla karışık gözlerle sana bakarken zorlukla nefes alıyor. Sonra aniden diz çöküp yorgunlukla ağlamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Leydi Theodora hayattayken her şey yolunda gidiyordu... Benim değerimi bilirdi, hayatımı değiştirmişti! Sesleri de neredeyse hiç duymaz olmuştum. Ama sonra... Sonra... O... Onu rüyalarımda görmeye başladım. Sesler de gece gündüz kafamdan çıkmaz oldu...."
